availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p: To any Constable of Jefferson County you are commanded to arrest John Nelson William Nelson and Dorcas and bring them forthwith before me or some other Justice of the Peace of said County at Dr Wilson's will to answer the charge made against them of having committed an assault and Battery on the person John Gilliland at the house of the said John Nelson on the 14th day of June 1862
Given under my hand this 16th day of June 1862
T. J. Conner J. P. J. C.

Summon
John Gilliland Jr and T Sturgeon
T. J. Conner J. P. J. C.

Com'th
vs } Warrant
John, William, and Dorcas Nelson
Executed the within warrant of arrest By arresting John, William and Dorcas Nelson and bringing them before T. J Conner a Justice of the Peace of Jefferson County this 18th day of June 1862
J. G. Walden C. J. C
